website_summaries.verdict: This 24-pack of soft and absorbent toilet paper is a user favorite while remaining affordable.
pros: This toilet paper has a soft feel, yet is strong enough not to easily shred while using
Paper is also absorbent, meaning that you don’t need to use many squares in each bathroom visit
cons: Rolls are so large that they may not fit on all holders

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit in TP holder
customer_reviews.text: They have changed the roll size. They’re narrower, and much larger in diameter. Now they don’t fit on a regular sized toilet paper holder.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: NOT ULTRA SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Charmin ultra soft toilet paper so I’m very accustomed to it’s feel. This paper is NOT the ultra soft charmin. It feels like the tissue paper found in public restrooms. There are 3 packs, and the second pack feels a little softer but still not the typical Charmin ultra soft. Also, Rolls are big but the individual sheets are thin. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Roswell

customer_reviews.title: The Last Laugh
customer_reviews.text: When I had my two ancient bathrooms redone, I did not want to spoil the tiles by drilling holes and mounting the toilet paper brackets on the tiles. So, I installed the brackets beneath the wooden cabinets. My friends said that this was against all tradition, that it was odd, that I was dealing with forces that I did not understand and that were beyond my control. But now "Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!" The Charmin Mega Roles fit. Now who has the last laugh? Ha!
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: This stuff saved my life.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this. This was was able to get me through my nightmare on the toilet after eating chili cheese fries and 5 sliders from Krystals. I only have one roll left after that ordeal, but without this toilet paper, I would have been in some very deep... You get the picture. 5 out of 5 stars, will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rothfuss

customer_reviews.title: Believe the size reviews! SIZE MATTERS!
customer_reviews.text: The good: super soft. Your bum will be pleased. The bad: the size. I read all the reviews about this and thought it was still. Until these arrived. They are noticeably narrower than any other TP we've ever used. Almost 1/4 so. So it looks skinny on the tp holder. It's also THICK. So thick that it can't turn freely in some of our TP holders. This has never happened before. Summary: good thick soft tp, but weird sizing
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: still good paper, it just feels wrong in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that the "Mega" role is actually a marketing scam. The rolls are about 20% narrower and so tall that I have to remove 15 to 20 feet of paper before it will fit in my TP holder. 20% narrower, throw away 15ft, hmmmm. I'd be surprised if I didn't have less usable paper with this roll. With that said it's still Charmin, still good paper, it just feels wrong in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Chasomatic

customer_reviews.title: The Poke Through Eliminator
customer_reviews.text: For our household, the two of us, Charmin is the most suitable toilet paper. It is soft but without losing its strength. It is cost effective almost to a fault. I used to attempt a per use analysis only to find the elements of the analyses too variable and of little to no value when attempting isolate the sheets factors. So, while I wrestle with my impatiences, I simply ask myself "Does Charmin work for us better than other similar products?" and with a positive response pull the lever for Charmin Soft.
customer_reviews.author: John Schëar

customer_reviews.title: Interesting how they mess with the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I only use Charmin. I normally get my tp at Costco. When I saw this I thought it would make my life easier and they were bigger. HA they are narrower but only about 3/8 of an inch thicker (if that). So in my opinion not worth it. If I can find the exact item that is at Costco at the same or close to it in price I'll switch my subscription. If not, I'll just continue to buy at Costco when they are on coupon.
customer_reviews.author: catfvr

customer_reviews.title: Not standard size and not advertised that rolls are shorter than normal rolls!  Beware!
customer_reviews.text: They got me a second time ordering this. These rolls are shorter than standard size rolls of toilet paper and it isn't made known in the listing. I'd ordered these once before and hated them - then just got them again even after searching the listing to be sure that the size was standard and not being able to locate the specs. It is is listed somewhere it needs to be changed to be seen easily for consumers to make a choice. Extremely poor advertising both by Amazon & the Charmin brand! Very disappointed and unhappy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: spmspiff

customer_reviews.title: Not in my House
customer_reviews.text: Not supporting Old Spice and the myriad of Proctor & Gamble brands anymore thanks to Gillette’s anti-male propaganda.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Guse

customer_reviews.title: Fat & narrow rolls
customer_reviews.text: These rolls are fat and narrow! They don’t even fit right on the standard bathroom holder! I know manufacturers have been doing this lately with a lot of paper products so they can fool the consumer into thinking they are getting the same or more value for their money! Since they don’t list the dimensions of the sheets or roll, they figured out a way to scam! I will search for another brand that sells standard sized rolls of TP.
customer_reviews.author: R. Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Roll is too big
customer_reviews.text: These rolls will not fit in a standard toilet paper roll holder. There should be some kind of warning before you order. I emailed Charmin, and they sent me a link to a website where i could order 1 extender for free. OK, but I have 3 bathrooms. Stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Paper!!!!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who this seller is, but bless you my friend. All of the blessings and positive vibes to you and your family. You have saved my quarantine!!! Beautiful, soft, toilet paper!!!! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you, to the Amazon Seller of this toilet paper. Thank you for charging me a fair price. Thank you, to the driver who delivered it! Thank you, to the people who wrapped it! Thank you, to the people who boxed it! Thank you, to the people who put on the shipping label! Thank you, P&G for continuing to provide your superior products during this pandemic! THANK YOU ALL!!!!! xoxoxoxoxo
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Equivalent doesn’t make sense
customer_reviews.text: So received my delivery on December 10,2019. The packaging says 8 rolls =41 rolls. As of January 10,2020 (4 weeks) I have used 16 rolls or 2 pkgs. which means 82 regular rolls. How is it 2 people who work can use 82 rolls of toilet paper in 14 days? That’s about 6 rolls a day for 14 days- who can use that much toilet paper in that time?
customer_reviews.author: MILAGROS V. ALAMEDA

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: It’s like wiping your @$$ with a handful of baby ducks.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Seeley

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHARMIN by far!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the Charmin that I buy in the store, much mor durable as well as absorbent! Doesn’t fall apart and the perforation is not straight, it’s more “decorative” with curvy lines!! Go ahead and laugh but hey ... thought it was worth mentioning anyways!!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Beware.. smaller sheets
customer_reviews.text: Not a happy camper. Feel cheated. The roll diameter may be huge (too huge for many/most) but the sheet size is smaller leading to greater usage. It's one thing to sort thru super confusing double/jumbo/mega/family/etc ...but now I've got to worry about sheet size.
customer_reviews.author: Mes

customer_reviews.title: Trying to find a decent toilet paper deal.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is a good deal at all. With all the options I just get overwhelmed. I am including pictures with measurements and thickness as well. I do feel it’s not as soft as the ultra plush I have gotten before but it’s labeled correctly and is soft. It does fit on all toilet paper rolls in our home
customer_reviews.author: MeredithR

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I would have never thought this day would come but it did. I was running low on TP and it took me a good 2 weeks to find toilet paper. The price didn’t even matter to me at that point. Good quality, thick, fast shipping but expensive. My advice is to constantly be on the look out. Keep searching throughout the day and it’ll appear randomly! Good luck everyone, stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: The rolls are truly gigantic. Won't fit in the toilet paper holder. Larger than normal "super size" rolls. Won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggims

customer_reviews.title: God Sent
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for TP for a while now. I was near the end of my rope. I was constantly on Amazon looking for TP. I always ordered their brand, but it has been unavailable during this time. I finally was able to order some TP. I paid a higher price, but I was desperate. The TP was delivered about a week later. The TP was delivered around 8:00 p.m. I cried with tears of joy. I immediately put it in my safe, and slept well knowing that I have TP.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A. Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 5x and received 8=41 I like to receive what I order, I will keep,but will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: One Pack Charmin Ultra Soft, One Pack ?
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this big bag of Charmin Ultra Soft. Or, it would have been if the whole bag actually contained Charmin Ultra Soft. The big bag does say that's what's inside. However, inside the big bag are separate packages containing 6 rolls each. These are clear plastic bags with no writing on them. The first package I opened was great- the same soft Ultras I always get at the store. But, the second bag is definitely NOT Ultras. They have the same decorative pattern etched into them. But, they are thin and rough. These are not Ultra. I don't know what they are. BTW, the shipping box was a Walmart box even though I ordered from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ElbeauTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Prepare yourself for clitty litter
customer_reviews.text: Is this toilet paper soft? Yes. Is it absorbent ? Yes!.... Does it leave confetti across your skin? ABSOLUTELY. I have never seen a toilet paper disperse such a fine dust while being used. I keep a cleaning bottle next to my toilet and I was shocked at how fast it was covered with the toilet paper dust disintegration. Don't even get me started on how much toilet paper lint is left behind. I feel like I have to take a shower everytime i use this stuff. Also I have not had problems with the non-family mega rolls, i have noooo idea why this product is so vastly different haha.
customer_reviews.author: Ali O

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised; neither soft as formerly, nor 'cushiony'
customer_reviews.text: I'm ok with the size, having moved on to an extended holder that fit my old wall holder at the beginning of the Mega mania. This paper feels very much like what is offered in public rest rooms. I was disappointed and won't purchase this again. Like the club stores, I think perhaps Amazon sells a product of less quality than what is available in stores. I'm finding that with several of the items I've received over the past few year, including perfume that is nothing like what is available in dept. stores. You get what you pay for. I tried this product by the box twice. Ditto paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: New Toilet Paper Math is Tricky
customer_reviews.text: I seriously resent having to pay so much for toilet paper just to flush it down the toilet and yet I want to be clean and not scratched up while getting clean. Charmin Ultra Soft Toilet Paper is definitely the softest out there and my husband insists it's the very best. I agree that it is soft. It's pretty good at cleaning the bottom though it does leave lint. I can never tell if it is really a good value for the money. The new toilet paper math is pretty tricky. Per square it seemed like a good deal but can we really be sure?
customer_reviews.author: Utah Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the best toilet paper out there!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I want to address the complaint about it being a half inch shorter in width...this is true, but did you really need the half inch? Just rotate the sheet sideways and it more than makes up for it! That aside, these are massive rolls that will get you safely through the apocalypse and keep your business comfortable the whole time! I love Charmin Ultra Soft (the Ultra Strong is just a hut too rough for me) and this is a great deal on the best toilet paper out there!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: If you squeeze it, your aura glows to the 9th participle
customer_reviews.text: I use these to decorate myself when I have to go into the woods or when my chakras are mis-aligned. Super Absorbing of bad vibes from spirits from the 8th realm of sadness.
customer_reviews.author: RiceCovered Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not standard size, very narrow, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a .5 inch narrower! and now taller so it won’t fit in my in-wall dispenser. You have to use twice as much it to have ample hand coverage. don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raleighs

customer_reviews.title: Get that Charmin Booty Shine!
customer_reviews.text: Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper is amazing! Once you use this, all other TP pales by comparison - it's scratchy, chafing, irritating. Charmin is Proctor & Gamble's product expertise at its apex! People coming over use our guest bath and ask "what kind of toilet paper is that? It's so soft!" Seriously! I now pack a roll for business trips and have to sometimes fight housekeeping in hotels to keep them from stealing it! My kids are asking if they can take an 8-pack to college with them so they don't have to use dorm TP. When people stay over, we have to check their bags to make sure they're not stealing our TP... Yes, it's just that good!
customer_reviews.author: CM10014

customer_reviews.title: Clean Bum
customer_reviews.text: Pair this with the Charmin wet wipes and you won’t have to scrub your bum in the shower!! Seriously, it’s a joke. Scrub your a$$ and don’t forget behind your ears, it gets gross AF back there people! I’m not SUPER impressed with the, for lack of a better word, dust, or paper particles, this particular “model”of Charmin leaves behind. I get that I’m not wiping with the Ferrari of s$&t tickets here, just hate dusting, and farting dust. I don’t need to be reminded of my age Charmin.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnalynn Beal

customer_reviews.title: Seems extra but very worth
customer_reviews.text: I used to be the kind of person that only bought generic brand TP to save money. We had some emergency TP shortage so I just decided to get this from amazon before we ran out. This one purchase has lasted my household much longer than buying cheaper rolls and overall saved us money. Each square is thick and soft so you don't need to use as much. Don't be cheap like me and get some good tp
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Not Charmin's best
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had this item on sale just as I was preparing to buy Charmin at Costco. I figured the cost pert sheet and Amazon was a bit less expensive. I should have consider the size of the sheets in my calculations. These sheets are much more narrow than normal, are NOT soft, and will not fit in the average toilet paper holder. I missed my return window, so will give away.
customer_reviews.author: gnortle

customer_reviews.title: Soft yes but it falls apart instantly
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is really soft but it falls apart while using and it leaves behind little pieces of toilet paper so with that said my family and I didn’t enjoy this experience and will not be buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmateur

customer_reviews.title: Plush Bottom Goodness!
customer_reviews.text: I mean come on, if I have the time and the inclination to write a review of toilet paper , and if you actually read toilet paper reviews.... umm, we got a problem and that is that we should find something better to do!! Butt, ok. Here we are. This Charmin is double wide like everyone is becoming. So, it does the job. And here’s the useful part of this review—single ply toilet paper is a rip off because it isn’t strong enough so you have to use alot more . This is two ply, wider and stronger. So it is cheaper . In the end.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G

customer_reviews.title: This is the largest mega roll of Charmin
customer_reviews.text: I love Charmin toilet paper - especially the large rolls. But their wording on size is misleading. I thought that Mega was the largest size. But it is and isn't. I bought the mega size at a store but then noticed that the mega size was smaller than these mega rolls that they call mega FAMILY size. So if you want the largest roll that fits in a standard toilet roll dispenser, this is the item for you. And given how hard this size is to find in many stores, Amazon is the best place to buy it for the best price!
customer_reviews.author: OKNatureDogTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Deal ...Awesome Seller!!!!
customer_reviews.text: High marks for this seller!! I have been using Charmin Ultra Soft for years, and this IS the real deal!! Love the large rolls which fit fine on a standard ceramic wall mount holder, and I thought the pricing was awesome..... especially considering that Prime Shipping was FREE!!! If I had been able to find toilet paper locally, which I could not, it would have cost more..... even on sale!! Thank you so much for offering this and providing A+ service. I hope you can restock, so I can purchase again!! I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Paper is a necessity
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely funny about toilet paper and have used Charmin for years. I love these big rolls because they last forever and don't have to be changed all the time. My husband and I used different brands because he just doesn't have good taste in toilet paper. Being the queen in my household I deserve the best.
customer_reviews.author: Janiandkids

customer_reviews.title: Soft toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to buy nearly everything online now to avoid the drama of going out in public, and I feel like I have a better quality of life because I don't like shopping whatsoever or crowds. This is a pretty soft toilet paper, and I prefer mega rolls since constantly changing them out is frustrating, and I like less waste with the cardboard insert. Personally, My all-time favorite is the toilet paper with ripples, but I would say this is my second best as it really is pretty soft.
customer_reviews.author: 🌿 Fern 🌿

customer_reviews.title: No complaints except, Ironically, the size.
customer_reviews.text: I think this toilet paper is soft and there is plenty of it, but ironically, it fits in my toilet paper holder, but it is so full, it doesn't turn easily until after a few layers have been used. In our home, we have the toilet paper holder standalone with the round holder down below to keep a few extra rolls. These are so large, that they won't fit in them, so it has become inconvenient enough, that i have recently removed them from our subscribe and buy in favor of a more normal size roll. If size is not a problem, then these are great. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Brian Easterwood

customer_reviews.title: My Fav!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TP for your bunghole, I don't care what Beavis says. Was a little touch and go when Covid was first an issue as people were hoarding it, but now that it's available again, the rest of us can have the luxury of softness and toughness in one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Keats

customer_reviews.title: This is the good stuff !
customer_reviews.text: I have previously used this brand and love it, but it hasn't been on the shelves locally for a good while with all the covid shenanigans. I didn't think I had a chance of having the good stuff till the craze had ended, but have been lucky to find it available for a few minutes here and there and have ordered a few packs. Once I learned how to play the ordering game here, it's been all good. So Thankful for this luxury !
customer_reviews.author: Jacey

customer_reviews.title: Charmin
customer_reviews.text: When this package arrived, I found myself telling the Toilet Paper.... "Welcome back old friend, we happily welcome you to the family!" Thanks for shipping it so quickly, packaging perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LHH

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft & Absorbent♡
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper is thick, soft, absorbent and awesome! My whole family loves it, and I believe you'll love it too. The rolls are really big, they feel wonderful, and this is definitely my favorite toilet paper by far! If you have an old septic system, be careful not to flush too much paper down at once. The thickness can back up your toilet and leave you with an unpleasant job to take care of. But otherwise, this is seriously the best toilet paper I've ever used. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfortable, May Clog Your Septic System
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice toilet paper for those with sensitivities. It is soft to the touch, and has just enough weight to it so that you don't feel as though you are in a race condition with thin piece of tissue paper. It is worthy to note that, with extended use, this toilet paper will reduce the time between the need for cleaning your septic system. It may also clog pipes that have inadequate flushing pressure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: WHAT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Double roll, mega roll, family mega, super mega, etc. Why so many? I got one that is too big, Family mega, when I use regular Mega. All the color print lauding it's virtues, page after page on the product page. Would it kill them to line all the various size rolls up and take a picture to compare for the product page? It's called "customer service", or we go to another company. Pick a couple sizes and STICK WITH THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gillean

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a good thing?
customer_reviews.text: It's Charmin, dependable brand name. The mega rolls are too big to fit in wall type roll dispenser. I had to buy a stand alone TP holder. This is the best deal on Amazon (subscribe and save) and lasts a family of 4 for two months (that is if your 5 year old doesn't use half a roll at a time)
customer_reviews.author: Stardust

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used Charmin for probably 20 years, but due to the toilet paper shortage it was the only thing available. It definitely feels like a luxury compared to the big box store TP I usually buy, but also comes with the luxury cost. My kids LOVE it and never want to go back. That said, it's a little too thick for kids to he using. It can clog the pipes if you aren't mindful of what you're using.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Like a soft kiss
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper is fantastic! It felt like wiping myself with a white fluffy cloud. after I wiped it was like a dark storm cloud with the loud booming thunder above. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger rolls store easier and replaced less
customer_reviews.text: The larger rolls allow better storage and fewer changes of empty rolls. This is great for most newer houses, but may be a problem of fitment with old styles of tissue holders that the large large rolls simply won't fit. A new holder from any home improvement store or Amazon will allow you to upgrade to the new larger rolls. Your cost per sheet will save you some money, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kent R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the best
customer_reviews.text: The very large roll really does last and last. It is still very soft. I haven't tried every tissue out there, but it must be near the top. Not quite as soft as it used to be but this is actually good. I had heard several years ago that the additional softness required more and older trees to be used. Don't know if this is true but I hope we aren't wiping our bums with first growth forests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the Go!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the Go! My hiney is clean!! I really was tired of using magazine pages and old rags! Who would have thought Amazon would come through to save the day in the Apocalypse!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Charmin has been our preferred bathroom tissue for a long time. In my estimation, it is the best tissue as far as softness and absorbency go. However, we go through a lot of it. It was fantastic to see it as one of the subscribe and save items because it saves my family so much money! It is cheaper than we can buy the same amount in the stores and I love being able to order it when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ceara

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon you're an angel when I got this today it brought tears to my eyes exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon you've been a godsend I really had to search high and low under different titles of toilet paper to find this but thank God i did my step dad's 82 and I take care of him and every time we go to the store nothing's left thank you your a angel. Such good quality toilet paper like I'm seriously impressed like if I could give you 10 million stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon  Customer

customer_reviews.title: How can you complain? Perfect tail tissue
customer_reviews.text: I don't grt the complaints. Charmin Ultra Soft is just that and the weight is now listed. Basically this is 3x 8 rolls each 5+ standard rolls (when was the last time you saw a standard roll of Charmin TP for sale?). The size is on the large size, but the larger 6x rolls ("Super Mega") don't fit my holders, and they are late 80's so huuuuge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Charmin--the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Charmin is the BEST TP and softest! I love the HUGE rolls! Good luck finding it! All the price gougers are buying up the high demand products, then "re-listing" them on Amazon for TRIPLE the price! This is PRICE GOUGING! Why is Amazon allowing this, especially during a crisis???
customer_reviews.author: Yellowrose158

customer_reviews.title: Best TP ever!
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to Charmin Ultra Soft being available in this size and quantity -- SOON I hope! After having to order sub-standard tp from other countries and buying one garbage roll of one ply sandpaper at a time after it was panic hoarded by others -- I will never again complain about the cost of Charmin!! <3 <3 <3
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Is Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toilet paper that does not rub him the wrong way. It is a bit on the linty side for me, and as someone who uses it for more than one purpose, I prefer brands that do not immediately start to dissolve when they touch any liquid (translation: better in back than out front). However, it is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Better than Costco and the gi-enormous rolls are a game changer. You don’t know how much your getting until you see it next to an old charmin roll.
customer_reviews.author: Darlenemishelly

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF....
customer_reviews.text: less paper at 2X the price than I get from Costco at 1/2 the price. only 338 sheets per roll. that does not add up to super size rolls.. Value is about $18.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work as good as Costco brand
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toilet paper during the pandemic as we couldn't find any anywhere else, it took 6 weeks to be delivered at 3 times the cost of pre-pandemic prices. Although it's toilet paper and not much to say except it just didn't work as well as the Costco brand we have used for years. We ended up putting it in the kids bathroom as they aren't as picky.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Star Woodcraft

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yay! Charmin!
customer_reviews.text: have no words to describe the happiness I am feeling for having charmin delivered right to my door during this pandemic! It is a rare site to see charmin let alone a huge box right in front of your door!!!
customer_reviews.author: ᴀᴍᴀᴢᴏɴ ʙᴏss

customer_reviews.title: Woops... Something missing
customer_reviews.text: Same wonderful paper. Same big roll... but...the roll isn’t as wide as it used to be. See picture attached. Not the same Bargain for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Billy

customer_reviews.title: My butt loves this
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely the softest toilet paper I ever had. I use less wipes with this toilet paper so even though these are "expensive," it's actually cheaper because I use less of it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Dabandan

customer_reviews.title: ROLLS TOO LARGE FOR DISPENSER
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE****Rolls may BE TOO LARGE for your dispenser! They won't fit in mine. Guess I have to stick with "big" rolls instead of "mega". Live and learn. Otherwise fine, but if they can't fit into a dispenser....what are you supposed to do with them? I guess if you have a basket or something.
customer_reviews.author: crazyWVUfan

customer_reviews.title: Trust me the less expensive brands are NOT worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had a family member bought a different brand of toilet paper and although it might seem like a great deal, it's actually not at all. It takes twice as much of the other brand to do the same job, and it's frustrating too because the other brands shred. Stick with the Charmin.
customer_reviews.author: Dm

customer_reviews.title: Good but too good.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft. Very absorbing. Doesn't create a ton of loose debris like most toilet paper. Though the sheets are so thick that we have to flush multiple times or else it clogs toilet. We only bought this product because our grocery store hasn't had any toilet paper in over 2 months and they keep saying they don't know when they will get some. Also driving to other towns for a single 4 pack is exhausting and inconvient.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly sackett

customer_reviews.title: Too large for the holder
customer_reviews.text: While ordering from Amazon is convenient, the new Family Mega size is very inconvenient. It’s so big that a new roll won’t fit in my holder, which is irritating. I don’t see why this change was necessary. I had to cancel my Amazon Charmin subscription since I can get the regular Mega size at Target.
customer_reviews.author: G MTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not strong
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of these, but I need to use more to accomplish the same thing, and at times they will tear. I'm sorry to say I'll be giving up a little of the softness for a stronger type.
customer_reviews.author: lauri

customer_reviews.title: The best in the world to wipe my ARSE with:)
customer_reviews.text: Superior to any other toilet paper I was in the Army. This toilet paper is like a little piece of heaven for an old soldier that used toilet paper that felt like sand paper
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: I love this TP
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says, soft and cushiony. We've been using it for a while so I'm glad to find it on Amazon. It's soft but doesn't leave as much lint as other "soft" kinds. I also don't have to use as much at a time. The Charmin Strong in the red label is okay as far as durability but not as soft. I will be adding this one to my Subscribe & Save.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Eidson

customer_reviews.title: Better than Scott!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these over Scott. I find Scott way too thin. These are thicker and softer. If they both had the same number of sheets, I would be using a lot more sheets with Scott than this. I use 2 sheets for each wipe when I use this versus about 8-10 for Scott. I would run out a lot slower with this and this is why this is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William Ng

customer_reviews.title: Proven product
customer_reviews.text: This has been around for years. The rolls keep getting bigger and bigger! We all have our favorite brand/kind and this is mine. I like getting a large supply shipped to the house. I really don't know if I am saving money or not, but the convenience is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: Was ok
customer_reviews.text: I know TP is better than gold right now, it was sheer luck I got this after trying for days! More expensive right now, but everyone is price gouging so no big surprise! Charmin is my favorite... although beggars can't be choosers at this point in the pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for TP, 1 star for roll. It doesn't fit in the dispenser or the roll storage container. Very aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: JP B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Even through the current shortages, my product has arrived promptly and is exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: The Seller should be fair with the price and not take advantage of the Global Pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: The seller should be fair with the price and not take advantage of the Global Pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Where's the love?
customer_reviews.text: In the future, forget gold, toilet 🚽 paper ! That's what you invest in! #panicbuyerstopit
customer_reviews.author: helenmft

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best toilet paper on the planet period.
customer_reviews.text: During this safer at home environment and the scare around the essentials. We were forced to try some of the competition. Many were soft to the touch but the quality never compared. As the lady of the house, I was never so happy to get my every two month delivery. 10+
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Very irritated and new smaller size sheets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Paper, while still two ply, is thinner. Ugh ... who wants that??? Size is smaller .... height of roll is at least 1/2 inch shorter .. ie smaller sheets .. ugh ... who wants that either?? Am very disappointed in these recent changes. And as someone else mentioned... too many options in packaging.... two would be plenty... Probably changing over to a lesser product... not worth paying for the high price spread when you get inferior product than in the past.
customer_reviews.author: table gamer

customer_reviews.title: This is terible
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Charmin for years. This is awful. It is narrow, thin, not like any Charmin I have had before. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Saxon

customer_reviews.title: Every Other TP Ranks #2 To This One...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done effectively. Never once have had any unwanted rips or tears during use. As someone who lives with IBS I feel I know a thing or #two about TP and this is my go-to. When on vacation I take two rolls because you just can’t risk not using the best down there. Also, no need to hoard because even with frequent usage our family of four goes three months with our subscription and still have some left. Do yourself a favor and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel & Jermaine R.

customer_reviews.title: Whew!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo glad I purchased this before the pandemic started! I’ve always loved charmin. People say that it’s too expensive but let’s get a little tmi real here - you don’t have to use as much of it as you do the cheap stuff so I think the price is a wash. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best Toilet Paper
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every toilet paper brand available, especially as of lately with shortages. If you are able to buy Charmin Ultra Soft it is worth the price. It is soft and strong at the same time. It almost feels like a soft cloth. It is also true it is thick enough that you don’t need to use as much quantity. No toilet clogs either! Just happy customers in my home!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: large rolls a plus for a large family
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of 7. Toilet paper disappears very quickly in this house. The large rolls at least last a little longer. But as price goes up, I may seek an alternate, though I prefer Charmin to any others I've used over the years.
customer_reviews.author: brokenbody

customer_reviews.title: Fairly standard toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly standard... nothing great, but nothing bad either. Pros: -bigger rolls means longer to run out -soft Cons: -can leave a bit of a residue since it doesn't stick together that well
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: had it shipped overseas
customer_reviews.text: The toilet paper in Poland is awful. Really glad I could get this from Amazon (though it was shipped to a NY Army depot and then brought here by the Army). Not thrilled about the price, but then I may be stuck in the 1990s with these things. The quality of the TP is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L. Greenagel IITop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft but geez I am getting aggravated from changing the roll so much
customer_reviews.text: Of course we normally go with Scott's but due to the shortage we ended up with these. They are bit narrower than we are used to but what drives me NUTS is the rolls last about 1/5 of a Scotts roll. Not my thing...
customer_reviews.author: BurntICE

customer_reviews.title: “Mega” translation.
customer_reviews.text: Regular mega is 4x more than regular, family mega is 5x, super mega is 6x. If u, or family members, hate reloading the tp holder, this is vital information. Doubleroll seems so puny now.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Just Keep Trying
customer_reviews.text: Timing is everything. I just kept trying to find TP on Amazon and finally looked at the right time. A minute later there was none left. This is exactly what you would hope for. The best TP and enough to last a while. I never thought I would be so grateful for Charmin. It was exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Eastland

customer_reviews.title: Too Big of a Roll
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a three for one reason and one reason only- the roll is too big for standard holders. If the reduced the tube by a 1/4”, all that paper would fit into a standard fixture and still spin.
customer_reviews.author: Cater Tater

customer_reviews.title: Is the convenience worth the price?
customer_reviews.text: People pay for convenience. So, if you’re willing to spend more for a product to come to you and save you a trip out, go for it. It was worth it for me for a time or two, but I probably won’t pay the extra cost in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jesyka

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Comfiest toilet paper ever; very high quality, and love that you need to use so much less of this at a time than the bargain brand. My only complaint is that the roll is so big, when it rolls when first put on, it scrapes up against the wall, which in turn has lighted the finish of the wood and the paint in two different bathrooms where the paper holder is mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy of Oz

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: Makes my butt feel good, like right after a shower except without the soap, water, and towel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels flimsy compared to pre covid + few times I've gotten at store, like it's not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Feel like counterfeit TP is sold on Amazon or mfg has cut corners in quality during pandemic. It's not like it was just a year ago or the rate occasion I find at the drug store. Definitely quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST T P
customer_reviews.text: I have loved Charmin toilet paper for many years. No other product can beat it for softness and strength. I have refused to use any other brand for years and years and I will continue to do so
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Better than cottonelle.
customer_reviews.text: It’s like candy for your butt. Way nicer than cottonelle ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Boerner

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this toilet paper for years. My last order (of 24 rolls, unfortunately) is a whole new ballgame. I would swear they are 1 ply. The paper falls apart and you need to use twice as much. They are making this differently than they have in the past. Choose another brand. I will NEVER trust Charmin again.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive!
customer_reviews.text: If we were not under stay at home orders, I would never buy Charmin. Too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Who used my TP?
customer_reviews.text: Box was partially open, and one package of toilet paper was ripped open. One roll was smaller than the rest, and was unrolling freely, like someone broke the glued section that prevents unrolling.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Clarke

product_meta.title: Charmin Ultra Soft Cushiony Touch Toilet Paper, 24 Family Mega Rolls = 123 Regular Rolls
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 24Introducing Charmin Ultra Soft Family Mega Roll, our BIG, long-lasting roll that equals 5+ Regular Rolls for mega value. Charmin Ultra Soft Family Mega Roll has a unique cushiony touch so it is harder than ever to resist! It is 2x more absorbent so you can use less than the leading bargain brand. Also, Charmin Ultra Soft Family Mega Roll Family Mega Roll Toilet paper is 2-ply and septic-safe. We all go to the bathroom, those who go with Charmin Ultra Soft Family Mega Roll really Enjoy the Go! (Based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue).
feature_bullets: Pack contains 24 Rolls (338 sheets per roll) of Charmin Ultra Soft Family Mega Roll toilet paper
1 Charmin Family Mega Roll = 5+ Regular Rolls based on number of sheets in Charmin Regular Roll bath tissue
Charmin’s softest 2-ply toilet paper ever made
Charmin’s irresistibly soft toilet paper with a unique cushiony touch
More absorbent so you can use less vs. the leading bargain brand

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
